org.silex.runtime.domObject.base.DOMObjectBase

type
class
subclasses
org.silex.runtime.domObject.js.DOMObject
This is a base class for runtime specific DOMObject. A DOMObject is an abstraction of the visual base element of a runtime. For instance in JS, a DOMObject is an HTML element, like a
or element. In Flash AS3, a domObject is a Sprite. A Domobject can contain other DOMObjects. This class abstracts manipulating DOM elements, each runtime is implemented in an inheriting class

Static Variables

rootDOMObject : DOMObjectBase

root dom object of the publication TO DO : remove it, it belongs to Publication and must not be static as multiple publication may run at the same time. Only left for now to allow compilation

Constructor

new(?nativeReference : Dynamic)
class constructor. Set the native reference to the native DOMObject and initialise it

Instance Variables

alpha(getAlpha,setAlpha) : Float

The opacity of the DOM Object, from 0 to 1

children(getChildren,null) : Array<DOMObjectBase>

height(getHeight,setHeight) : Int

isVisible(getIsVisible,setIsVisible) : Bool

Wheter the DOMObject is visible

matrix(getMatrix,setMatrix) : org.silex.runtime.geom.Matrix

nativeReference(getNativeReference,setNativeReference) : org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReference

onFocusIn : Void -> Void

The callback called when the DOMObject gains focus TO DO

onFocusOut : Void -> Void

The callback called when the DOMObject loses focus TO DO

onMouseWheel : Void -> Void

The callback called when there is a mouse wheel event over the DOMObject TO DO

parent(getParent,setParent) : DOMObjectBase

width(getWidth,setWidth) : Int

x(getX,setX) : Int

y(getY,setY) : Int

zOrder(getZOrder,setZOrder) : Int

The z-order / z-index of this DOM Object, relative to its parent (the first child of a DOMObject always has a 0 z-order)

Instance Methods

addChild(domObject : DOMObjectBase) : Void

parameters
domObject the DOMObject to attach to this DOMObject
Set the current DOMObject as the parent of the added domObject, and store it in the children array. Overriden by each runtime, to add the child to native DOM.

getAlpha() : Float

return the opacity of the DOM Object, from 0 to 1

getAttribute(propertyName : String) : Dynamic

parameters
propertyName the name of the field value to return
returns
might be any type
Return the value of a field of the native object

getChildren() : Array<DOMObjectBase>

returns
an array of DOMObject
returns the children of this DOMObject

getHeight() : Int

getIsVisible() : Bool

Return wether the DOM object is visible. Implemented by runtime specific sub class

getMatrix() : org.silex.runtime.geom.Matrix

Return this domObject matrix

getNativeReference() : org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReference

returns
a DisplayObject in AS, an HTML element in JS, a resource in PHP
Returns the reference to this DOMObject native DOM element

getOnKeyDown() : org.silex.runtime.keyboard.Key -> Void

getOnKeyUp() : org.silex.runtime.keyboard.Key -> Void

getOnMouseDoubleClick() : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

getOnMouseDown() : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

getOnMouseMove() : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

getOnMouseOut() : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

getOnMouseOver() : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

getOnMouseUp() : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

getParent() : DOMObjectBase

Returns the DOMObject parent of this DOMObject

getRotation() : Int

returns
an Int from 0 to 360
Return the current rotation angle in deg

getScaleX() : Float

returns
a float, 1 corresponds to no x scale
Return the current x scale

getScaleY() : Float

returns
a float, 1 corresponds to no y scale
Return the current y scale

getTranslationX() : Float

returns
Return the current x translation

getTranslationY() : Float

returns
Return the current y translation

getWidth() : Int

getX() : Int

getY() : Int

getZOrder() : Int

onKeyDown(org.silex.runtime.keyboard.Key) : Void

The callback called on key down through the keyboard instance

onKeyUp(org.silex.runtime.keyboard.Key) : Void

The callback called on key up through the keyboard instance

onMouseDoubleClick(org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData) : Void

The callback called when this dom object is double-clicked

onMouseDown(org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData) : Void

The callback called on mouse down through the mouse instance

onMouseMove(org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData) : Void

The callback called when the mouse move over this dom object

onMouseOut(org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData) : Void

The callback called on mouse out of this dom object

onMouseOver(org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData) : Void

The callback called when the mouse over this dom object

onMouseUp(org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData) : Void

The callback called on mouse up through the mouse instance

removeChild(domObject : DOMObjectBase) : Void

parameters
domObject the DOMObject to remove from this DOMObject
Reset the parent of the remove child object as it no longer is attached to the DOM, remove it also from the children array. Overrident by each runtime to remove also from the native DOM

resetTransformations() : Void

Reset the matrix to an identity matrix (no transformations)

rotate(angle : Int, ?transformationOrigin : org.silex.runtime.geom.TransformationOriginValue) : Void

parameters
angle the rotation angle, in degree
transformationOrigin the pivot point, represented as an enum value or as a point
Rotate the domObject with the given angle using the transformationOrigin as pivot point

scale(scaleX : Float, scaleY : Float, ?transformationOrigin : org.silex.runtime.geom.TransformationOriginValue) : Void

parameters
scaleX the horizontal scale factor
scaleY the vertical scale factor
transformationOrigin the scale center, represented as an enum value or as a point
Scale the domObject with the scaleX and scaleY factor, using the transformationOrigin as scaling center

setAlpha(value : Float) : Float

parameters
value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque)
Set the opacity of the DOM object

setAttribute(propertyName : String, propertyValue : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
propertyName the name of the field
propertyValue the new value of the field
Set a field value on the native DOM object

setHeight(value : Int) : Int

setIsVisible(value : Bool) : Bool

parameters
value true if the DOM object must be visible
Show or hide the native DOM Object. Implemented by runtime specific sub class

setMatrix(matrix : org.silex.runtime.geom.Matrix) : org.silex.runtime.geom.Matrix

Set the transformation matrix of this domObject. Used by the inheriting runtime specific class to update their native matrix transformations

setNativeReference(value : org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReference) : org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReference

returns
a DisplayObject in AS, an HTML element in JS, a resource in PHP
set the reference to this DOMObject native DOM element

setOnKeyDown(value : org.silex.runtime.keyboard.Key -> Void) : org.silex.runtime.keyboard.Key -> Void

setOnKeyUp(value : org.silex.runtime.keyboard.Key -> Void) : org.silex.runtime.keyboard.Key -> Void

setOnMouseDoubleClick(value : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void) : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

setOnMouseDown(value : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void) : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

setOnMouseMove(value : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void) : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

setOnMouseOut(value : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void) : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

setOnMouseOver(value : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void) : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

setOnMouseUp(value : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void) : org.silex.runtime.mouse.MouseEventData -> Void

setParent(domObject : DOMObjectBase) : DOMObjectBase

set the parent of this DOMObject

setRotation(angle : Int, ?transformationOrigin : org.silex.runtime.geom.TransformationOriginValue) : Void

parameters
angle the target angle
transformationOrigin the rotation center
Set the rotation to an absolute angle instead of adding a rotation to the existing rotation

setScaleX(scaleX : Float, ?transformationOrigin : org.silex.runtime.geom.TransformationOriginValue) : Void

parameters
scaleX the target x scale
transformationOrigin the scale center
set the absolut x scale of the domObject instead of adding it to the current scale

setScaleY(scaleY : Float, ?transformationOrigin : org.silex.runtime.geom.TransformationOriginValue) : Void

parameters
scaleX the target y scale
transformationOrigin the scale center
set the absolut y scale of the domObject instead of adding it to the current scale

setTranslationX(translationX : Float) : Void

parameters
translationX the target x translation
Set the absolut x translation instead of adding it to the current x translation

setTranslationY(translationY : Float) : Void

parameters
translationX the target y translation
Set the absolut y translation instead of adding it to the current y translation

setWidth(value : Int) : Int

setX(value : Int) : Int

setY(value : Int) : Int

setZOrder(value : Int) : Int

skew(skewX : Float, skewY : Float, ?transformationOrigin : org.silex.runtime.geom.TransformationOriginValue) : Void

parameters
skewX the horizontal skew factor
skewY the vertical skew factor
transformationOrigin the skew center, represented as an enum value or as a point
skew the domObject with the skewX and skewY factor, using the transformationOrigin as skewing center

translate(x : Float, y : Float) : Void

parameters
x the x offset
y the y offset
Translate the domObject along the x and y axis, using x and y as offset
